name: Bit Flip (urlish, CH51, Big Thor)
description:
Bit Flip is a platformer game where the space is not stable, and is switching between glitchy and normal. Use that to your advantage and overcome the levels ahead of you. Have fun!!!

Controls

  • Movement: WASD or direction arrows
  • Jump: Space bar
  • Interact: E or Left mouse button
  • Pause: P or Esc (this one will get you out of Fullscreen in browser)
  • Use UI through clicking (reload, mute, close dialogue box)

Credits

  • Art By Inez (artstation , instagram)
  • Art by Furu 
  • Game/Level Design by CH51  (Cyro Carvalho) itch io
  • Sound By Add3pt
  • Storytelling by Jessica Lucas (https://jessicalucas.carrd.co/#)
  • Development by Big Thor (Víctor Suárez https://big-thor.itch.io/) 
  • Development by Julio Chana (itch)

Glitch effect by https://github.com/staffantan/unityglitch

**There was a small edit to remove a try-catch condition that would not allow the game to be played in the browser but nothing substantial has been changed and the windows version has not been modified at all
